jobDescription: Position Summary:Our growing technical business needs a temporary Data Management Analyst I to provide service-oriented support of configuration management and data management deliverables. We need a detail-oriented resource who can work from written and or verbal instruction to accomplish daily tasking assignments. Assignments range from data entry, word processing, manipulating excel spreadsheets and auditing records. The ideal candidate will have experience working with engineering part attributes and related documentation.Overview:Configuration Management (CM) emphasizes the functional relation between parts, subsystems, and systems for effectively controlling system change. CM verifies that changes are carried out as prescribed through the Engineering Change (EC) process and that published documentation of items and systems reflects their true configuration. Data Management (DM) emphasizes the management of data and document artifacts supporting Defense Program and Engineering Change process deliverables. Support will include hands-on work organizing and preparing Engineering data and Program Management data. The CM/DM Support resource will be responsible for timely participation in normal business operations to include but not limited to daily tasking, email, status reporting, timesheets, and training. The candidate will report to the CMDM Lead. Essential Duties and Responsibilities:
